document.full_text: a 31-year-old ex-convict arrested in the beating of a san francisco giants fan at dodger stadium on opening day remained in custody on monday on a parole hold, prosecutors said.
document.title: dodger stadium beating suspect remains in custody
lines_and_colors: a 31-year-old ex-convict arrested in the beating of a san francisco giants fan at dodger stadium on opening day remained in custody on monday on a parole hold, prosecutors said.
